nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队
en: People's Armed Police First Mobile Corps

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队的机动总队之一，总部驻地河北省石家庄市。
description.en: One of the mobile corps of the People's Armed Police, headquartered in Shijiazhuang, Hebei Province.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队
武警部队
武警总部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分，中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的上级指挥机构。
description.en: A component of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China and the superior command structure for the PAP First Mobile Corps.

zh-cn: 朱文祥 (武警)
朱文祥

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的首任司令员，武警少将警衔。
description.en: The first commander of the People's Armed Police First Mobile Corps, holding the rank of Major General in the PAP.

zh-cn: 王焕章

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的首任政治委员，武警少将警衔。
description.en: The first political commissar of the People's Armed Police First Mobile Corps, holding the rank of Major General in the PAP.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队第六十三师

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第六十三师
武警第六十三师
中国人民武装警察部队8670部队

description.zh-cn: 原武警部队机动师，隶属于武警总部，驻甘肃省平凉市。2017年改革中调整组建为第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Pingliang, Gansu. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队第八十一师

武警第八十一师
中国人民武装警察部队8630部队

description.zh-cn: 原武警部队机动师，隶属于武警总部，驻天津市。2017年改革中调整组建为第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Tianjin. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Dingzhou, Hebei. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Panjin, Liaoning. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Xingcheng, Liaoning. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Gongyi, Henan. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

description.en: A former mobile division of the PAP, subordinate to the PAP Headquarters, stationed in Yuci District, Jinzhong, Shanxi. It was reorganized as part of the First Mobile Corps during the 2017 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队交通部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队交通部队
武警交通指挥部
武警交通部队

description.zh-cn: 原武警部队的一个警种，2017年改革中被撤销，人员并入新组建的机动总队。
description.en: A former branch of the PAP, which was disbanded during the 2017 reform, with its personnel merged into the newly formed mobile corps.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队第二机动总队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第二机动总队
en: People's Armed Police Second Mobile Corps

description.zh-cn: 与第一机动总队同期组建的武警机动力量。
description.en: A PAP mobile force established at the same time as the First Mobile Corps.

zh-cn: 机动第四支队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队下属单位，驻天津市河东区。
description.en: A subordinate unit of the PAP First Mobile Corps, stationed in Hedong District, Tianjin.

zh-cn: 2023年京津冀暴雨灾害

description.zh-cn: 2023年发生在中国京津冀地区的严重暴雨和洪水灾害。
description.en: A severe rainstorm and flood disaster that occurred in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region of China in 2023.

zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐七五事件
暴乱

description.zh-cn: 2009年7月在新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市爆发的严重暴力骚乱事件。
description.en: A series of violent riots that broke out in July 2009 in Ürümqi, the capital city of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队是中国人民武装警察部队的下属单位。
description.en: The PAP First Mobile Corps is a subordinate unit of the People's Armed Police Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 朱文祥自2017年起担任中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队司令员。
description.en: Zhu Wenxiang has served as the Commander of the PAP First Mobile Corps since 2017.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 王焕章自2017年起担任中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队政治委员。
description.en: Wang Huanzhang has served as the Political Commissar of the PAP First Mobile Corps since 2017.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第六十三师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第六十三师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 63rd Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第八十一师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第八十一师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 81st Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一一四师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第一一四师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 114th Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一一七师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第一一七师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 117th Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一二〇师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第一二〇师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 120th Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一二八师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第一二八师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 128th Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一八七师
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警第一八七师在武警部队调整改革中，被调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的一部分。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP 187th Division was reorganized as part of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队交通部队
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 2017年，原武警交通部队在武警部队调整改革中被撤销，其人员与机动师等一同调整组建为中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队。
description.en: In 2017, during the reform of the PAP, the former PAP Transportation Force was disbanded, and its personnel were reorganized along with mobile divisions into the PAP First Mobile Corps.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 机动第四支队是中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队的下属单位。
description.en: The 4th Mobile Detachment is a subordinate unit of the PAP First Mobile Corps.

description.zh-cn: 在2023年京津冀暴雨灾害期间，武警第一机动总队机动第四支队出动1500名武警、115辆车辆和8艘船只辅助救灾，以对抗灾害影响。
description.en: During the 2023 Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei torrential rain disaster, the 4th Mobile Detachment of the PAP First Mobile Corps dispatched 1,500 personnel, 115 vehicles, and 8 boats to assist in disaster relief efforts, combating the effects of the disaster.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一八七师

description.zh-cn: 乌鲁木齐七五事件发生后，武警第一八七师作为第一支援疆的外援部队，被紧急空运至新疆协助维持治安，以平息骚乱。
description.en: After the July 2009 Ürümqi riots, the PAP 187th Division, as the first external support unit, was urgently airlifted to Xinjiang to help maintain public order and quell the unrest.
